name: vscode-ai
description: Visual Studio Code extension for Azure Machine Learning

azureML.schemasVersion.description: Version prefix of the schemas to show (i.e. 0.0.22-october-cand will show 0.0.22-october-cand/workspace.schema.json from the blob)

scripts.lint: eslint -c .eslintrc.js --ext .ts ./src && cd ./azureml-language-server && npm run lint && cd ../azureml-js-sdk && npm run lint
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm install && npm run clean && npm run webpack && cd ./azureml-language-server && npm run prepublishOnly
